Script.Name: ConvertFrom-Base64.ps1
Script.Synopsis: Converts base64-encoded text to bytes or text.

Script.Name: ConvertFrom-CimInstance.ps1
Script.Synopsis: Convert a CimInstance object to a PSObject.

Script.Name: ConvertFrom-DataRow.ps1
Script.Synopsis: Converts a DataRow object to a PSObject, Hashtable, or single value.

Script.Name: ConvertFrom-Duration.ps1
Script.Synopsis: Parses a Timespan from a ISO8601 duration string.

Script.Name: ConvertFrom-EscapedXml.ps1
Script.Synopsis: Parse escaped XML into XML and serialize it.

Script.Name: ConvertFrom-Hex.ps1
Script.Synopsis: Convert a string of hexadecimal digits into a byte array.

Script.Name: ConvertFrom-XmlElement.ps1
Script.Synopsis: Converts named nodes of an element to properties of a PSObject, recursively.
